tika-s0103t:818_17: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkīyanti na saṅkīyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā
tika-s0103t:818_18: samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti yehi navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi,
tika-s0103t:818_19: tāni tāva ānetvā thomanāvaseneva vaṇṇento “te kho panete”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:818_24: Vaṃsāti jānitabbā buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā.
tika-s0103t:818_29: Na apanītapubbāti na chaḍḍitapubbā tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ paripūraṇūpāyabhāvato na paricattapubbā.
tika-s0103t:818_32: Ye dhammasabhāvassa vijānaneva viññū samitapāpasamaṇā ceva bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇā ca,
tika-s0103t:819_0: Santuṭṭhoti ettha yathādhippetasantosameva dassento “paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:819_6: Svāyaṃ aniyamavācitāya eva yathā thūlādīnaṃ aññataravacano,
tika-s0103t:819_7: evaṃ yathāladdhādīnampi aññataravacanoti tattha dutiyapakkhasseva idha icchitabhāvaṃ dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:819_20: Ye hi parato gilānapaccayaṃ piṇḍapāte eva pakkhipitvā cīvare vīsati,
tika-s0103t:819_23: te sabbepi yathārahaṃ imesu eva tīsu santosesu saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchantīti.
tika-s0103t:820_0: Cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti “idaṃ nāma cīvaraṃ kappiya”nti jātito cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:820_4: Cīvarasantosoti cīvare labbhamāno sabbo santoso jānitabbo.
tika-s0103t:820_6: yāni tosanto cīvarasantosena sammadeva santuṭṭho hotīti.
tika-s0103t:820_8: Tattha khomaṃ nāma khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭacīvaraṃ,
tika-s0103t:820_11: Bhaṅganti pana khomasuttādīni sabbāni ekaccāni vomissetvā katacīvaraṃ.
tika-s0103t:820_14: Yadi evaṃ ito aññā vatthajāti natthīti?
tika-s0103t:820_16: sā pana etesaṃ anulomāti dassetuṃ “dukūlādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0103t:820_26: Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-s0103t:820_28: taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesameva anulomañca.
tika-s0103t:820_30: taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-s0103t:820_31: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:821_0: Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitāni ekadesena dassetuṃ “kusacīra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:821_2: aññehi vā tādisehi tiṇehi katacīvaraṃ kusacīraṃ.
tika-s0103t:822_1: katikāya detī”tiādinā āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ cīvaruppattimātikānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0103t:822_11: yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sīsaṃ nhāpetvā “kāḷakaṇṇīcoḷaka”nti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti.
tika-s0103t:823_0: Dhajaṃ ussāpetvāti nāvaṃ ārohantehi vā yuddhaṃ pavisantehi vā dhajayaṭṭhiṃ ussāpetvā tattha baddhaṃ pārutacīvaraṃ,
tika-s0103t:825_0: Mahātheraṃ tattha attano sahāyaṃ icchantopi garugāravena gāmadvāraṃ “bhante gamissāmi” iccevamāha.
tika-s0103t:825_1: Mahātheropissa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “ahaṃ pāvuso gamissāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:825_2: “Imassa bhikkhuno vitakkassa avasaro mā hotū”ti pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0103t:825_4: Tadā bhagavato dukkarakiriyānussaraṇamukhena tathāgate uppannapītisomanassavegassa balavabhāvena kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā tasmiṃyeva…pe…
tika-s0103t:826_2: manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti evamādicintanāya kā nāma kathā.
tika-s0103t:826_4: tena cīvaraṃ paṭicca kiñcipi na cintetabbaṃ evāti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:827_0: Apesalo appatirūpāyapi pariyesanāya paccayo bhaveyyāti “pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:828_0: Āhariyamānanti susānādīsu patitakaṃ vatthaṃ “ime bhikkhū paṃsukūlapariyesanaṃ carantī”ti ñatvā kenaci purisena tato ānīyamānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:829_0: Evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpīti evaṃ paṭilābhasantosaṃ akopetvāva laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi.
tika-s0103t:829_1: Attano pahonakamattenevāti yathāladdhānaṃ paṃsukūlavatthānaṃ ekapaṭṭadupaṭṭānaṃ atthāya attano pahonakapamāṇeneva,
tika-s0103t:830_0: Gāme bhikkhāya āhiṇḍantena sapadānacārinā viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanaṃ nāma cīvaraloluppassa dūrasamussāritattā.
tika-s0103t:834_2: tassa pahonakaniyāmeneva yathāladdhaṃ thūlasukhumādiṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:835_4: taṃ pana atthato tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ heṭṭhimantena vuttaparimāṇameva hoti.
tika-s0103t:837_0: Kusibandhanakāleti maṇḍalāni yojetvā sibbanakāle. Sattavāreti sattasibbanavāre.
tika-s0103t:839_0: Sītapaṭighātādi atthāpattito sijjhatīti mukhyameva cīvaraparibhoge payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “hirikopīnapaṭicchādanamattavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:840_0: Vaṭṭati, na tāvatā santoso kuppati sambhārānaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyānañca alābhato.
tika-s0103t:841_0: Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇato paribhoge ṭhatvā.
tika-s0103t:842_1: tesañca tassa paccayataṃ dassento iti ime dhammā aññamaññassa samuṭṭhāpakā,
tika-s0103t:843_1: tattha catutthoyeva pakkho satthārā vaṇṇito thomitoti mahātherena tathā desanā katā.
tika-s0103t:843_3: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti seyyathāpi thero nālako (suttanipāte nālakasutte vitthāro) eko na santuṭṭho hoti,
tika-s0103t:843_7: Seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyī eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti,
tika-s0103t:843_8: santosassa ca vaṇṇavādī seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo.
tika-s0103t:844_2: sāsane ṭhitānaṃ na patirūpaṃ asāruppaṃ ayogyaṃ.
tika-s0103t:844_3: Kohaññaṃ karontoti cīvaruppādanimittaṃ paresaṃ kuhanaṃ vimhāpanaṃ karonto.
tika-s0103t:844_6: Yathā sabbe kāyavacīpayogā tadatthā eva jāyanti,
tika-s0103t:845_0: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti attānaṃ neva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhato dahati.
tika-s0103t:845_2: Na vambhetīti na hīḷayati nihīnato na dahati.
tika-s0103t:845_3: Tasmiṃ cīvarasantoseti tasmiṃ yathāvutte vīsatividhe cīvarasantose.
tika-s0103t:845_4: Kāmañcettha vuttappakārasantosaggahaṇena cīvarahetu anesanāpajjanādipi gahitameva tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato,
tika-s0103t:845_6: vaṇṇavāditānattukkaṃsanā paravambhanāni pana gahitāni na hontīti “vaṇṇavāditādīsu vā”ti vikappo vutto.
tika-s0103t:845_7: Ettha ca “dakkho”tiādi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasenassa yathāvuttasantosādi ijjhati,
tika-s0103t:845_11: “sampajāno”ti iminā pāṭihāriyapaññaṃ “paṭissato”ti iminā tattha asammosavuttiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:846_2: Piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabboti piṇḍapāte santoso pabhedato jānitabbo.
tika-s0103t:847_4: Saṅghato vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto uppajjati uddesādivasena vā.
tika-s0103t:847_5: Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:847_6: Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā uddesena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:847_9: Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ.
tika-s0103t:847_13: Dhuragehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:848_0: Vitakketi “kattha nu kho ahaṃ ajja piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti.
tika-s0103t:848_1: “Kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti therena vutte “asukagāme bhante”ti kāmametaṃ paṭivacanadānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:848_4: Tato paṭṭhāyāti vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā vitakkitakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0103t:848_5: “Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hotī”ti idaṃ tiṇṇampi ariyavaṃsikānaṃ vasena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:848_7: Sabbopi hi ariyavaṃsiko ekavārameva vitakketuṃ labhati,
tika-s0103t:849_0: Gahetabbamevāti aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo. Yāpanamattameva gahetabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:851_0: Sapadānacārino viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantosoti āha “dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabba”nti.
tika-s0103t:853_2: kāyassaṭhitiādipayojanaṃ pana atthāpattito āgataṃ evāti āha “jighacchāya…pe…
tika-s0103t:854_2: Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitenāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhitena.
tika-s0103t:855_23: yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:855_25: Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇo patissayaviseso “vaṭṭākārena katasenāsana”nti keci.
tika-s0103t:856_0: Piṇḍapāte vuttanayenevāti “sādako bhikkhu ‘ajja kattha vasissāmī’ti vitakketī”tiādinā yathārahaṃ piṇḍapāte vuttanayena veditabbā,
tika-s0103t:856_1: “tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro”ti,
tika-s0103t:856_2: “senāsanaṃ gavesantenāpi’kuhiṃ labhissāmī’ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gantabba”nti ca evamādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva.
tika-s0103t:857_0: Kasmā panettha paccayasantosaṃ dassentena mahātherena gilānapaccayasantoso na gahitoti?
tika-s0103t:857_1: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dassento “gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭho”ti āha,
tika-s0103t:857_3: Yadi evaṃ tattha piṇḍapāte viya vitakkasantosādayopi pannarasa santosā icchitabbāti?
tika-s0103t:857_5: Nanu cettha dvādaseva dhutaṅgāni viniyogaṃ gatāni,
tika-s0103t:857_6: ekaṃ pana nesajjikaṅgaṃ na katthaci viniyuttanti āha “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:857_7: Ayañca attho aṭṭhakathāruḷho evāti dassento “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:858_0: “Pathaviṃ pattharamāno viyā”tiādi ariyavaṃsadesanāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ mahāvisayatāya tassā desanāya.
tika-s0103t:858_1: Yasmā nayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitā hoti ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato pavattiyamānā desanā yathā taṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe,
tika-s0103t:858_2: ayañca bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsakathā ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato pavattiyamānā evaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “sahassanayappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t:858_4: Paṭipakkhavidhamanato abhimukhabhāvena ramaṇaṃ āramaṇaṃ ārāmoti āha “abhiratīti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:858_5: Byadhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ vasena bhavati bāhiratthasamāso yathā “urasilomo,
tika-s0103t:858_8: pahānaṃ ārāmo assāti pahānārāmoti evamettha samāsayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:858_11: “Bhāvento ramatī”ti vuttattā bhāvanārāmoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:859_0: Kāmaṃ “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti vuttaṃ bhāvanānuyogassa anucchavikattā,
tika-s0103t:859_1: nesajjikaṅgavasena pana nesajjikassa bhikkhuno ekaccāhi āpattīhi anāpattibhāvoti tampi saṅgaṇhanto “terasannaṃ
tika-s0103t:859_2: dhutaṅgāna”nti vatvā “vinayaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabba”nti icchitattā sallekhassa apariccajanavasena paṭipatti
tika-s0103t:859_5: Kāmaṃ suttābhidhammapiṭakesupi tattha tattha sīlakathā āgatā eva,
tika-s0103t:859_6: yehi pana guṇehi sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:859_7: tesu kathitesu yathā sīlakathābāhullaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:859_9: abhidhammapiṭakañca catutthena ariyavaṃsena kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ kathitaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:859_10: “So nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramatī”ti nekkhammapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha desanāya pavattattā,
tika-s0103t:859_11: sabbesampi vā samathavipassanāmaggadhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃpaṭipakkhato nikkhamanena nekkhammasaññitānaṃ
tika-s0103t:859_12: tattha āgatattā so pāṭho “nekkhammapāḷī”ti vuccatīti āha “nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo”ti.
tika-s0103t:859_13: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammanti pavuccare”ti.
tika-s0103t:860_2: “So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā āgatā paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāti idhādhippetā,
tika-s0103t:861_1: ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatī”ti ca na idaṃ dasuttarasutte āgataniyāmena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:861_3: eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti ca desanā āgatā.
tika-s0103t:861_4: Evaṃ santepi yasmā atthato bhedo natthi,
tika-s0103t:861_5: tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyaṃ āgatanīhāreneva “ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati,
tika-s0103t:861_8: Yasmā cāyaṃ ariyavaṃsadesanā nāma satthu paññattāva satthārā hi desitaṃ desanaṃ āyasmā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero saṅgāyanavasena idhānesi,
tika-s0103t:861_9: tasmā mahāariyavaṃsasutte satthudesanānīhārena nigamanaṃ dassento “evaṃ kho,
tika-s0103t:861_14: ekavīsatiyā pana ṭhānānaṃ vasena vitthārato yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:862_4: Saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyanti yathā abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti,
tika-s0103t:862_5: evaṃ satiyā upaṭṭhāpane cakkhādīnaṃ pidahane analasassa uppannavīriyaṃ.
tika-s0103t:862_10: Purimuppannasamādhi hi parato uppajjanakasamādhipavivekassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti “samādhinimitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:863_1: Taṃ āgammāti taṃ nibbānaṃ maggena adhigamahetu.
tika-s0103t:863_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti vossajjanavasena pariṇāmitaṃ pariccajanavasena ceva pakkhandanavasena ca pariṇamanasīlaṃ.
tika-s0103t:863_10: Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati,
tika-s0103t:863_14: Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ pāpuṇantī ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ekaṃsato nibbānaṃ “pakkhandatī”ti vattabbataṃ labhati,
tika-s0103t:863_17: tasmā yathākkamaṃ vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena pakkhandanapariccāgavossaggāpi veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:863_20: Taṃ pariṇamanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca icchitanti āha “vipassanābhāvañceva maggabhāvañca pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0103t:864_0: Bhaddakanti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavidhamanena ekantahitattā,
tika-s0103t:864_4: Anurakkhatīti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito yathā na parihāni hoti,
tika-s0103t:865_0: Ekapaṭivedhavasena catusaccadhamme ñāṇanti catūsu ariyasaccesu ekābhisamayavasena pavattañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:865_7: tadanuguṇā pavattīti phalañāṇasseva dhamme ñāṇatā vuttā,
tika-s0103t:865_10: Ettha ca maggapaññā tāva catusaccadhammassa paṭivijjhanato dhammeñāṇaṃ nāma hotu,
tika-s0103t:865_11: phalapaññā pana kathanti codanā sodhitā hoti nirodhadhammaṃ ārabbha pavattanato.
tika-s0103t:865_12: Duvidhāpi hi paññā aparappaccayatāya attapaccakkhato ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca pavattattā “dhammeñāṇa”nti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:866_1: Paccakkhato disvāti cattāri saccāni maggañāṇena paccakkhato paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0103t:866_2: Yathā idānīti yathā etarahi pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0103t:866_3: evaṃ atītepi anāgatepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccamevāti ca sarikkhaṭṭhena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:866_7: Nirodhasacce pana sarikkhaṭṭho natthi tassa niccattā,
tika-s0103t:866_9: Evaṃ tassa ñāṇassa anugatiyaṃ ñāṇanti tassa dhammeñāṇassa “evaṃ atītepī”tiādinā anugatiyaṃ anugamane anvaye ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:866_15: iminā dhammena ñātenāti imaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ ñāṇena jānitvā ṭhitena maggañāṇenāti attho.
tika-s0103t:866_19: Pariyogāḷhenāti catusaccadhammaṃ pariyogāhetvā ṭhitenāti evaṃ tāvettha abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:866_22: kāraṇañca nayanayanassāti duvidhenāpi tena dhammenāti na na yujjati.
tika-s0103t:866_24: maggaphalasaṅkhātassa vā dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā nayanayanaṃ hotīti tena iminā dhammena ñāṇavisayabhāvena,
tika-s0103t:866_25: ñāṇasampayogena vā ñātenāti ca attho na na yujjatīti.
tika-s0103t:866_27: anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
tika-s0103t:866_30: satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ atītānāgate nayanayanasadisaṃ kataṃ maggamūlakattā.
tika-s0103t:867_0: Paresaṃ cetaso parito ayanaṃ paricchindanaṃ pariyo,
tika-s0103t:867_5: Dhammeñāṇādīnaṃ viya hi sātisayassa paṭivedhakiccassa abhāvā visayobhāsanasaṅkhātajānanasāmaññena “ñāṇa”nti sammatesu antogadhanti attho.
tika-s0103t:867_6: Sammutivasena vā pavattaṃ sammutimhiñāṇaṃ sammutidvārena atthassa gahaṇato.
tika-s0103t:867_7: Avasesaṃ vā itarañāṇattayavisabhāgaṃ ñāṇaṃ tabbisabhāgasāmaññena sammutimhiñāṇamhi paviṭṭhattā sammutimhiñāṇaṃ nāma hotīti.
tika-s0103t:868_6: Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso hoti lokiyassa ñāṇassa visabhāgūpagamanato.
tika-s0103t:868_7: No vivaṭṭeti vivaṭṭe abhiniveso no hoti avisayabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:868_11: atthato ca yathārahaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchanamanasānupekkhanādivasena cittena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gaṇhitvā.
tika-s0103t:869_4: pariññeyyatā pana tattha natthīti na vipassanābyāpāro.
tika-s0103t:869_5: Kevalaṃ pana anussavamatte ṭhatvā accantapaṇītabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0103t:869_7: uparūpari abhirucijananena manassa vaḍḍhanato manāpanti manasikāraṃ pavatteti.
tika-s0103t:869_10: tāni ca uddissa asammohapaṭivedhavasena pavattamāno hi maggo te uddissa pavatto nāma hotīti.
tika-s0103t:869_14: Ārammaṇavasenāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi asammuyhanakiccavasenapi tattha paṭivedho labbhateva.
tika-s0103t:869_21: idaṃ assa kāraṇa”nti yāthāvato ñāṇena ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tāni gambhīrāni.
tika-s0103t:869_23: Tāni saṇhasukhumabhāvato sabhāveneva gambhīratāya yāthāvato ñāṇena durogāhattā “duddasānī”ti.
tika-s0103t:871_8: Tattha yesaṃ vasena catusaccasampaṭivedhāvahaṃ saddhammassavanaṃ labbhati,
tika-s0103t:871_12: saṃsāradukkhe ca apatante dhāretīti evamādi guṇātisayayogavasena santo saṃvijjamāno, pasattho,
tika-s0103t:871_17: Sā pana mahāvisayatāya na sabbā sabbassa visesāvahāti tassa tassa anucchavikameva dassento āha “sappāyassa tepiṭakadhammassa savana”nti.
tika-s0103t:872_0: Aveccappasādenāti saccasampaṭivedhavasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ñatvā uppannappasādena,
tika-s0103t:872_1: so pana pasādo devādīsu kenacipi akampiyatāya niccaloti āha “acalappasādenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:872_3: Lūkhapaṇītavatthuvasenāti odanakummāsādikassa lūkhassa ceva paṇītassa ca vatthuno vasena.
tika-s0103t:872_4: Sā panāyaṃ āhārassa oḷārikasukhumatā “kumbhilānaṃ āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatā eva.
tika-s0103t:873_8: Rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati tena vinā appavattanato.
tika-s0103t:873_11: Rūpakkhandho gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ paccayo etassāti rūpakkhandhagocaraṃ rūpaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhāvena patiṭṭhā etassāti rūpappatiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:873_12: Iti tīhi padehi abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pati rūpakkhandhassa sahakārīkāraṇabhāvoyevettha vutto.
tika-s0103t:873_14: yathā byañjanehi upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ odanaṃ rucitaṃ,
tika-s0103t:873_16: evaṃ nandiyā upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ abhirucitaṃ hutvā vipākayogyaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0103t:873_19: Evaṃ pavattamānanti evaṃ rūpūpāyanti desanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:873_27: Ekantato vedanupāyādivasena patti nāma arūpabhave yevāti āha “imehi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:873_31: evaṃ tena nibbattetabbāpi te gayhantīti adhippāyena “catukkavasena…pe…
tika-s0103t:873_33: Vipākopi hi dhammo vipākadhammaviññāṇaṃ upagataṃ nāma hoti tathā nandiyā upasittattā.
tika-s0103t:874_9: Atha vā bhavābhavoti khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:874_15: Sītādīni na khamatīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgakālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:875_0: Samādhijhānādibhedo dhammo pajjati paṭipajjīyati etenāti dhammapadaṃ.
tika-s0103t:875_9: Kāmaṃ saviññāṇakaasubhepi jhānabhāvanā alobhappadhānā hoti kāyassa jigucchanena,
tika-s0103t:875_11: sattavidhauggahakosallādivasena panassā pavatti satipadhānāti tatiyadhammapadeneva naṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmo “dasa asubhavasena vā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:875_12: Hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattanato brahmavihārabhāvanā byāpādavirodhinī abyāpādappadhānāti āha “catubrahma…pe…
tika-s0103t:875_15: Gamanādito āhārassa paṭikkūlabhāvasallakkhaṇaṃ saññāya thirabhāveneva hoti tassā thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānattāti
tika-s0103t:875_16: āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāpi tatiyadhammapade eva saṅgahaṃ gatā.
tika-s0103t:875_18: sattavidhabojjhaṅgavijjāvimuttipāripūrihetuto ānāpānesu paṭhamaānāpānabhāvanā visesato samādhipadhānāti sā catutthadhammapadena saṅgahitā.
tika-s0103t:876_0: Dhammasamādānesu paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā etarahi ca dukkhabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:876_2: Acelakapaṭipadāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ channaparibbājakānampi ubhayadukkhāvahapaṭipattidassanato.
tika-s0103t:876_4: brahmacariyacaraṇaṃ etarahi satipi dukkhe āyatiṃ sukhāvahattā.
tika-s0103t:876_7: saddena ko pana vādo labhamānassāti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:877_1: so pana sīlādi evāti āha “guṇaṭṭho khandhaṭṭho”ti.
tika-s0103t:877_4: Vimuttikkhandhoti paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttā guṇadhammā adhippetā,
tika-s0103t:877_6: nāpi vimuccamānāti tehi saha desanaṃ āruḷhā sīlakkhandhādayopi tayoti āha “phalasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0103t:877_8: Eteneva cettha vimuttikkhandhoti phalapariyāpannā sammāsaṅkappavāyāmasatiyo adhippetāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:878_1: eteneva ahirikaanottappānampi savisaye balaṭṭho siddho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:878_2: Na hi tesaṃ paṭipakkhehi akampiyaṭṭho ekantiko.
tika-s0103t:878_6: maddante naṃ parissayā”ti bodhipakkhiyadhammavasenāyaṃ desanāti “samathavipassanāmaggavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:879_4: Tena adhiṭṭhānena tiṭṭhanti attano sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ guṇādhikā purisā,
tika-s0103t:879_5: te eva tattha adhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti sammāpattiyā,
tika-s0103t:879_11: na nippadesatoti nippadesatova tāni dassetuṃ “paṭhamena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:879_19: “Vikkhambhite kilese”ti etena samāpattīhi kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena vūpasamaṃ vatvā ādi-
tika-s0103t:879_20: saddena heṭṭhimamaggehi kātabbaṃ tesaṃ samucchedavasena vūpasamaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:879_25: sabbasaṅkhārūpasamabhāvato upasamoti ca visesato vattabbataṃ arahatīti therassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:879_27: anavasesato kilesānañcajante ca vūpasante ca uppannattā cāgo,
tika-s0103t:879_28: upasamoti ca visesato aggaphalañāṇaṃ vuccatīti thero āha “sesehi arahattaphalapaññā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:881_21: “Sukhadukkhavipāka”nti vatvā tattha sukhadukkhānaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “missakakammañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:881_22: Kammassa kaṇhasukkasamaññā kaṇhasukkābhijātihetutāyāti apacayagāmitāya tadubhayaviddhaṃsakassa kammakkhayakarakammassa
tika-s0103t:882_0: Pubbenivāso sattānaṃ cutūpapāto ca paccakkhakaraṇena sacchikātabbā;
tika-s0103t:882_1: itare paṭilābhena asammohapaṭivedhavasena paccakkhakaraṇena ca sacchikātabbā.
tika-s0103t:882_4: na pana paccakkhakaraṇavasena pavattati paccakkhakārīnaṃ piṭṭhivattanato.
tika-s0103t:883_1: Tathābhūtā ca adho sīdenti nāmāti āha “osīdāpentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:883_2: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena ogho cāti,
tika-s0103t:884_1: bhavādiṃ bhavantarādīhi dukkhe satte yojenti ghaṭṭentīti yogā.
tika-s0103t:885_3: saṅkhalikacakkalikānaṃ viya paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ vā ganthanaṃ gantho,
tika-s0103t:885_5: Palibundhatīti nissarituṃ appadānavasena na muñceti vibandhati.
tika-s0103t:886_9: “Attā”ti paññāpento vadati ceva abhinivesanavasena upādiyati ca.
tika-s0103t:887_0: Yavanti tāhi sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoniyo,
tika-s0103t:887_1: tā pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭhā khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattivisesāti āha “yoniyoti koṭṭhāsā”ti.
tika-s0103t:887_3: Tattha vā te sayitā jāyantīti sayanaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:887_10: Devamanussesūti ettha ye deve sandhāya devaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:888_0: Attano satisammosena āhārappayogena maraṇato “paṭhamo khiḍḍāpadosikavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:888_1: Attano parassa ca manopadosavasena maraṇato “tatiyo manopadosikavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:890_4: sā pana mahāphalatāya veditabbāti āha “mahapphalā hontī”ti.
tika-s0103t:893_0: 314. Tesu acelakoti nidassanamattaṃ channaparibbājakānampi attakilamathaṃ anuyuttānaṃ labbhanato.
tika-s0103t:895_5: Paraṃ parato ayanaṃ gati niṭṭhāti attho. “Nīce…pe…
tika-s0103t:895_10: “Tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretī”ti etena tassa jotiparāyanabhāvaṃ dasseti pakāsabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:896_6: Patanubhūtattāti ettha dvīhi kāraṇehi patanubhāvo veditabbo adhiccuppattiyā,
tika-s0103t:896_8: Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-s0103t:896_10: Uppajjamānā ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya maddantā abhibhavantā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0103t:896_11: dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā tanukākārā uppajjanti.
tika-s0103t:896_12: Iti kilesānaṃ patanubhāvena guṇasobhāya guṇasoraccena sakadāgāmī samaṇapadumo nāma.
tika-s0103t:896_13: Rāgadosānaṃ abhāvāti guṇavikāsavibandhānaṃ sabbaso rāgadosānaṃ abhāvena.
tika-s0103t:896_14: Khippameva pupphissatīti aggamaggavikasanena nacirasseva anavasesaguṇasobhāpāripūriyā pupphissati.
tika-s0103t:896_20: Ganthakārakilesānanti cittassa baddhabhāvakarānaṃ uddhambhāgiyakilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvā samaṇasukhumālo
tika-s0103t:900_1: Saccesu viya ariyasaccāni khandhesu upādānakkhandhā antogadhāti khandhesu lokiyalokuttaravasena vibhāgaṃ
tika-s0103t:900_2: dassetvā itaresu tadabhāvato “upādānakkhandhā lokiyā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:901_1: Yathā hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā siddho “taṃsamaṅginā santānalakkhaṇena sattena kato”ti voharīyati,
tika-s0103t:901_2: evaṃ upapattibhavalakkhaṇā gatiyo paramatthato asatipi gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yehi tāni kammāni “katānī”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0103t:901_5: taṃ brūhanto eva uppajjatīti ayo, sukhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:901_8: Avīciādiokāsepi nirayasaddo niruḷhoti āha “sahokāsena khandhā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:902_1: Peto vā ajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati laggacittatāya,
tika-s0103t:902_3: Tehi tehi kāraṇehi ādīnavaṃ dassetvā yathā aññe na labhanti,
tika-s0103t:902_7: paresaṃ vaṇṇo “kiṃ vaṇṇo eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadati.
tika-s0103t:902_9: te ca taṃ na maccharāyanti macchariyassa sabbaso pahīnattāti tassa asambhavo evāti āha “pariyattidhamme”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:902_10: “Ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā aññathā atthaṃ viparivattetvā nassessatī”ti dhammānuggahena na deti.
tika-s0103t:902_11: “Ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā uddhato unnaḷo avūpasantacitto apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti puggalānuggahena na deti.
tika-s0103t:902_12: Na taṃ adānaṃ macchariyaṃ macchariyalakkhaṇasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0103t:903_0: Cittaṃ nivārentīti jhānādivasena uppajjanakaṃ kusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathāssa uppajjituṃ na denti.
tika-s0103t:903_5: “Āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”nti ādivacanato na yidaṃ “pariyāyena vutta”nti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-s0103t:903_6: sabbesampi tebhūmakadhammānaṃ kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmabhāvato bhavarāgassapi kāmacchandabhāvassa icchitattā.
tika-s0103t:903_9: “Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa akalyatā”ti ādivacanato thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ.
tika-s0103t:903_10: Tathā “yā tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhassā”ti ādivacanato middhaṃ khandhattayagelaññaṃ.
tika-s0103t:903_13: Tathā uddhaccanti uddhaccassa arahattamaggavajjhataṃ upasaṃharati tathā- saddena,
tika-s0103t:903_15: Na hi tassa tādisī ubhayatā atthi.
tika-s0103t:903_17: taṃ idha anupayogi sekkhasantānavuttino eva cettha adhippetattā.
tika-s0103t:904_1: “Orambhāgiyāni uddhambhāgiyānī”ti visesaṃ anāmasitvā “saṃyojanānī”ti sādhāraṇato paduddhāro idāni vuccamānacatukkānucchavikatāvasena,
tika-s0103t:904_2: kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kathañcipi avinipāteyyatāmutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayattā
tika-s0103t:904_5: Tathā hi yassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni,
tika-s0103t:904_10: bahi ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya antobaddhā bahisayitā nāma.
tika-s0103t:904_16: Asamucchinnesu ca orambhāgiyasaṃyojaniyesu laddhappaccayesu uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni agaṇanūpagāni hontīti.
tika-s0103t:904_17: Ariyānaṃyeva vasenettha catukkassa uddhaṭattā labbhamānāpi puthujjanā na uddhaṭā.
tika-s0103t:907_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā tathā desanāti āha “puthujjanakhīṇāsavāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:910_11: Ayasaṃ āropeti “ime maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhantā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0103t:912_7: “Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatattā”ti vuttattā paccekabodhisattasāvakabodhisattānampi paṇidhānato pabhuti āgatā saddhā āgamanasaddhā eva,
tika-s0103t:912_15: yathā tena paṭivedhena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ ahosi,
tika-s0103t:912_19: saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya ca saddhā na tathāti aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso.
tika-s0103t:912_25: Padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti sakkaccaṃ padahanato.
tika-s0103t:913_5: Daḷhaṃ katvā paccantī hi gahaṇī ghorabhāvena pittavikārādivasena rogaṃ janeti,
tika-s0103t:913_8: Gahaṇītejassa mandatikkhatāvasena sattānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sītuṇhasahagatāti āha “atisītagahaṇiko”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:913_9: Yāthāvato accayadesanā attano āvikaraṇaṃ nāmāti āha “yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā”ti.
tika-s0103t:913_13: Nibbijjhituṃ samatthāyāti tadaṅgavasena avasesaṃ pajahituṃ samatthāya.
tika-s0103t:913_14: Tassa tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ imasmiṃ ñāṇe anadhigate pavattārahaṃ,
tika-s0103t:915_1: “Suddhā āvasiṃsū”tiādinā addhattayepi tesaṃ suddhāvāsapariyāyo abyabhicārīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:915_2: Kilesamalarahitāti nāmakāyaparisuddhiṃ vadanto eva rūpakāyaparisuddhimpi atthato dasseti.
tika-s0103t:916_0: Āyuno majjhanti avihādīsu yattha yattha uppanno,
tika-s0103t:916_10: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhaṃ assa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto.
tika-s0103t:916_12: Sodhetvāti tattha tattha uppajjanto te te devaloke sodhento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “cattāro devaloke sodhetvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:916_13: Tattha tattha vā uppajjitvā puna anuppajjanārahabhāveneva tatopi gacchanto devūpapattibhavasaññite attano
tika-s0103t:916_15: Ayañhi avihesu kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:916_16: tatthāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:916_17: tatthāpi cattārikappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:916_18: tatthāpi aṭṭhakappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:918_1: Cetokhilā nāma atthato vicikicchā kodho ca,
tika-s0103t:918_5: Yathā lakkhaṇapāripūriyā gahitāya sabbā satthurūpakāyasirī gahitāva nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:918_6: evaṃ sabbaññutāya sabbā dhammakāyasirī” gahitā eva nāma hotīti tadubhayavatthukameva kaṅkhaṃ dassento “sarīre kaṅkhamāno”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:918_11: “Paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamāno”ti ettha kathaṃ lokuttaradhamme kaṅkhā pavattatīti?
tika-s0103t:918_13: anussavākāraparivitakkaladdhe parikappitarūpe kaṅkhā pavattatīti dassento āha “vipassanā…pe… vadanti,
tika-s0103t:918_14: taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:918_16: “Kāmañcettha visesuppattiyā mahāsāvajjatāya ceva saṃvāsanimittaghaṭṭanāhetu abhiṇhuppattikatāya ca ‘sabrahmacārīsū’ti kopassa visayo visesetvā vutto,
tika-s0103t:918_17: tato aññatthāpi pana kopo ‘na cetokhilo’ti na sakkā viññātu”nti keci.
tika-s0103t:918_18: Yadi evaṃ vicikicchāyapi ayaṃ nayo āpajjati,
tika-s0103t:920_2: Taṃ pana vinibandhantā muṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhantī viya hontīti āha “cittaṃ bandhitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:920_3: Kāmagiddho puggalo vatthukāme viya kilesakāmepi assādeti abhinandatīti vuttaṃ “vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepī”ti.
tika-s0103t:920_12: Iti pañcavidhopi lobhaviseso eva cetovinibandho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:923_1: Nissarantīti nissaraṇīyāti vattabbe rassaṃ katvā niddeso.
tika-s0103t:923_9: Tādisassa bhikkhuno kilesavasena kāmesu manasikāro nāma natthīti āha “vīmaṃsanattha”nti.
tika-s0103t:923_11: kiṃ nu kho kāmavitakkopi uppajjatī”ti vīmaṃsantassāti attho.
tika-s0103t:923_13: so pana tattha natthīti āha “na pavisatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:923_15: vimuccanaṃ adhimuccananti taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipanto vadati “pasādaṃ nāpajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:923_16: Evaṃbhūtaṃ panassa cittaṃ tattha kathaṃ tiṭṭhatīti āha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:923_19: Cittaṃ pakkhandatīti parikammacittena saddhiṃ jhānacittaṃ ekaṭṭhavasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-s0103t:923_20: Gocare gatattāti attano ārammaṇe eva pavattattā.
tika-s0103t:923_24: Cittassa kāyassa ca hananato vighāto, dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:923_30: Evañca katvā kāmānanti kattari sāmivacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati.
tika-s0103t:923_32: tadaggena jhānampi kāmato “nissaṭa”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ “kāmehi nissaṭattā”ti.
tika-s0103t:923_33: Evaṃ vikkhambhanavasena kāmanissaraṇaṃ vatvā idāni samucchedavasena accantatova nissaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:924_1: Ayaṃ pana visesoti visesaṃ vadantena “taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā”tiādiko avisesoti vatvā dutiyatatiyavāresu sabbaso anāmaṭṭho,
tika-s0103t:924_2: catutthavāre pana ayampi visesoti dassetuṃ “accantanissaraṇe cettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:925_0: Yasmā arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā arahatte ṭhitassa cittaṃ sabbaso rūpehi nissaṭaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:925_1: Tassa hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ rūpābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassa idamakkhātanti samathayānikānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā cattāro vārā kathitā,
tika-s0103t:925_3: Puna sakkāyo natthīti uppannanti idāni me sakkāyappabandho natthīti vīmaṃsantassa uppannaṃ.
tika-s0103t:927_1: Vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti āha “vimuccanakāraṇānī”ti.
tika-s0103t:927_4: idha paññā”tiādinā taṃ taṃ pāḷiatthaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa.
tika-s0103t:927_5: Pāḷiṃ jānantassāti tadatthajotanaṃ pāḷiṃ yāthāvato upadhārentassa.
tika-s0103t:927_8: Yathādesitadhammaṃ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ pariggaṇhantassa somanassappattassa pamodalakkhaṇaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati.
tika-s0103t:927_9: Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā kāyacittadarathapassambhanasamatthāya
tika-s0103t:927_10: passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā balappattā pīti jāyati.
tika-s0103t:927_11: Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti,
tika-s0103t:927_13: Sukhaṃ paṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ cetasikaṃ nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ paṭilabhati vindati.
tika-s0103t:927_14: “Samādhiyatī”ti ettha na yo koci samādhi adhippeto,
tika-s0103t:927_15: atha kho anuttarasamādhīti dassento “arahatta phalasamādhinā samādhiyatī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:927_16: “Ayañhī”tiādi tassā desanāya tādisassa puggalassa yathāvuttasamādhipaṭilābhassa kāraṇabhāvavibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:927_19: Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiāruḷho samādhiyeva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa kāraṇabhāvato samādhinimittaṃ.
tika-s0103t:928_0: Vimutti vuccati arahattaṃ sabbaso kilesehi paṭippassaddhivimuttīti katvā.
tika-s0103t:931_3: pavattiatthañca gahetvā pavattatīti attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā;
tika-s0103t:931_4: ajjhattesu bhavāni ajjhattikānīti niyakajjhattesupi abbhantarāni cakkhādīni vuccanti,
tika-s0103t:931_7: Saddatthato pana ajjhattajjhattāniyeva ajjhattajjhattikāni yathā “venayiko”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:931_10: Ajjhattikānañhi paṭiyogīni bāhirāni ajjhattadhammānaṃ viya bahiddhādhammā.
tika-s0103t:931_15: “Viññāṇasamūhā”ti ettha yadipi tesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ natthi bhinnakālikattā,
tika-s0103t:931_16: cittena pana ekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhanavasena samūhatā vuttā yathā “vedanākkhandho”ti.
tika-s0103t:931_17: Cakkhupasādanissitanti cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya paccayaṃ labhitvā uppannaṃ kusalākusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇatāsāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:931_20: Ime dasa samphasseti ime pasādavatthuke dasa vipākasamphasse ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0103t:931_21: Eteneva nayenāti etena phasse vutteneva nayena.
tika-s0103t:931_22: Taṇhāchakke taṇhaṃ ārabbha pavattāpi taṇhā dhammataṇhāti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:932_3: Garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena paṭissavanaṃ paṭissavo,
tika-s0103t:932_9: Yathā cetiyaṃ uddissa kataṃ satthu katasadisaṃ,
tika-s0103t:932_10: evaṃ cetiyassa purato kataṃ satthu purato katasadisaṃ evāti āha “parinibbute panā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:932_11: Sakkaccaṃ na gacchatīti ādaraṃ gāravaṃ uppādetvā na upasaṅkamati.
tika-s0103t:932_13: agārave ca kate sabbā sikkhā kuppati,
tika-s0103t:932_14: sabbattha ca agāravaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti samudāyato saṃvarasamādānaṃ avayavato bhedoti.
tika-s0103t:932_17: Anādariyamattenapi sikkhāya aparipūriyevāti āha “apūrayamānova sikkhāya agāravo nāmā”ti.
tika-s0103t:933_7: kiriyābhedato pana paṭhamābhinipātatāya vitakkassa byāpāro sātisayo.
tika-s0103t:933_8: Tato paraṃ vicārassāti taṃ sandhāya “vitakketvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vatvā “vicārena paricchindatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:933_9: Laddhapubbāsevanassa vicārassa byāpāro paññā viya hoti.
tika-s0103t:933_10: Tathā hi “vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho”ti peṭake vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:933_11: “Diṭṭhisāmaññagato”ti ettha yāya diṭṭhiyā puggalo diṭṭhisāmaññaṃ gato vutto,
tika-s0103t:933_12: sā paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhi kosambakasutte adhippetoti āha “kosambakasutte paṭhamamaggo kathito”ti.
tika-s0103t:933_14: Catūsupi maggesu sammādiṭṭhi diṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitāti āha “cattāropi maggā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:935_2: Yasmā so appahīnakodhatāya vigatakodhano nāma na hoti,
tika-s0103t:935_6: Vivādo nāma uppajjamāno yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo”ti.
tika-s0103t:935_7: So pana yathā bahūnaṃ anatthāvaho hoti,
tika-s0103t:936_0: Paraguṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho,
tika-s0103t:936_3: parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho,
tika-s0103t:936_5: Palāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti,
tika-s0103t:936_9: Kammapathappattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā vasenettha micchādiṭṭhi veditabbāti āha “natthikavādī ahetukavādī akiriyavādī”ti.
tika-s0103t:938_2: Abhūtaṃ byākaraṇaṃ byākaroti “mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā”tiādinā attani avijjamānaṃ guṇabyāhāraṃ byāharati.
tika-s0103t:938_5: Puna byāpādo natthīti idāni mama byāpādo nāma natthi sabbaso natthīti ñatvā.
tika-s0103t:939_0: “Animittā”ti vatvā yesaṃ nimittānaṃ abhāvena arahattaphalasamāpattiyā animittatā,
tika-s0103t:939_3: rāgo eva vā nimittanti rāganimittaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0103t:939_7: Tayidaṃ nimittaṃ yasmā sabbena sabbaṃ arahattaphale natthi,
tika-s0103t:939_10: Nimittaṃ anusaratīti taṃ nimittaṃ anugacchati ārabbha pavattati.
tika-s0103t:940_2: vedanādīsu vā aññataralakkhaṇo ayaṃ nāma attā ahaṃ asmi.
tika-s0103t:940_5: Puna asmimāno natthīti tassa anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ kittento samugghātattameva vibhāveti.
tika-s0103t:942_2: anuttarāni eva anuttariyāni yathā anantameva ānantariyanti āha “anuttariyānīti anuttarānī”ti.
tika-s0103t:942_7: Tattha paripūraṇaṃ nippariyāyato asekkhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:942_8: Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya hi satta sekkhā tisso sikkhā pūrenti nāma,
tika-s0103t:943_0: Anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānānīti anussatiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0103t:943_1: Evaṃ anussaratoti yathā buddhānussati visesādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:945_3: bhavaṅgavelañca khīṇāsavā imināva chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena sabbakālaṃ viharanti.
tika-s0103t:945_6: Tasmā nissayasīsena nissitassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “cakkhuviññāṇena disvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:945_7: Iṭṭhe arajjantoti iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rāgaṃ anuppādento maggena samucchinnattā.
tika-s0103t:945_10: Asamapekkhaneti iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi ārammaṇe na samaṃ na sammā ayoniso gahaṇe.
tika-s0103t:945_16: Chaḷaṅgupekkhāti chasu dvāresu pavattā satisampajaññassa vasena chāvayavā upekkhā.
tika-s0103t:945_17: Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0103t:945_20: Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi saddhiṃ dasa cittāni labbhanti.
tika-s0103t:945_21: Arajjanādussanavasena pavatti tesampi sādhāraṇāti.“Upekkhako viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena
tika-s0103t:945_22: āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ “somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatī”ti codetvā “āsevanato labbhatī”ti sayameva
tika-s0103t:945_24: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatte viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato,
tika-s0103t:945_25: kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:945_26: tattha yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0103t:947_9: Paṭippassambhanavasena kilesānaṃ nibbāpanato nibbānaṃ sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya yathā taṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīlyakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t:947_10: Sace sukkaṃ bhaveyya yathā taṃ dānasīlādikusalakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t:947_13: Taṃ kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ yathā rāgādīnaṃ khayante jātattā rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti.
tika-s0103t:952_11: Tattha paññāya ṭhatvāti kammassakatāpaññāya patiṭṭhāya sucaritādīni pūretvā saggūpagā honti.
tika-s0103t:952_12: Tattha ceva pāramitā paññāya ca ṭhatvā sāvakapāramiñāṇādīni paṭivijjhanti.
tika-s0103t:954_3: “Vipassakasseva kathitā”ti vatvā tassa vipassanānibbattiṃ dassetuṃ “tesupī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:954_4: Catunnampi hi saccānaṃ visesena dassanato maggapaññā sātisayaṃ “vipassanā”ti vattabbā,
tika-s0103t:955_4: Bhāsitassāti suttageyyādibhāsitassa ceva tadaññassa ca attatthaparatthabodhakassa padassa.
tika-s0103t:955_6: Attānaṃ jānātīti yāthāvato attano pamāṇajānanavasena attānaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0103t:955_7: Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogamattaññutāhi eva pariyesanavissajjanamattaññutāpi bodhitā hontīti “paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:955_10: Atisambādhanti atikhuddakaṃ atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0103t:955_12: Bhikkhuparisādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare.
tika-s0103t:955_16: vipariyāyato tadañño asevitabbo”ti evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbaṃ puggalaṃ jānātīti puggalaññū.
tika-s0103t:956_5: Puna dasavasso na hotīti tesaṃ matimattanti dassetuṃ “so kirā”ti kirasaddaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:956_7: tassa nibbīsādibhāvassa viya ninnavādibhāvassa ca icchitattāti dassetuṃ “na kevalañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:957_0: Na idaṃ titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ tesu tannimittassa abhāvā.
tika-s0103t:958_2: Sikkhāya vā sammadeva ādito paṭṭhāya rakkhaṇaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:958_3: tañca atthato pūraṇe paricchinnaṃ arakkhaṇe sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato,
tika-s0103t:958_9: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccādivasena sammadeva nijjhānaṃ dhammanisāmanāti āha “vipassanāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0103t:958_13: taṃ pana sabbaso vīriyassa paribrūhanaṃ hotīti āha “kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe”ti.
tika-s0103t:958_14: Satiyañceva nepakkabhāve cāti satokāritāya ceva sampajānakāritāya ca.
tika-s0103t:958_18: Saccasampaṭivedhe hi ijjhamāne maggasammādiṭṭhi siddhā eva hoti.
tika-s0103t:959_3: Ādīnavānupassanāñāṇeti saṅkhārānaṃ aniccadukkhavipariṇāmatāsaṃsūcitassa ādīnavassa anupassanāvasena pavattañāṇe.
tika-s0103t:959_6: Kāraṇalābhe hi sati uppannārahā kilesā santāne anu anu sayitā viya honti,
tika-s0103t:959_9: Thāmagamanañca aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:959_14: Na hi kāmarāgavinimutto kāmarāgānusayo nāma koci atthi.
tika-s0103t:961_4: tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:962_0: “Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhī”ti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhī dāheyyuṃ dātabbamidamosadha”nti,
tika-s0103t:962_1: tasmā tesu aññataraññatarena vivadantā “aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0103t:963_1: Sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yebhuyyasikakammassa karaṇaṃ yebhuyyasikā.
tika-s0103t:963_2: Ayanti ayaṃ yathāvuttā catubbidhā sammukhatā sammukhāvinayo nāma.
tika-s0103t:964_6: tassa tassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanāya bhagavatā vuttavidhi,
tika-s0103t:965_2: Guḷhakādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya guḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo lajjussannāya vivaṭako,
tika-s0103t:966_1: Tattha pana dvīhi dvīhi eva vūpasamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:967_0: Na samaṇasāruppaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ, samaṇehi akattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ. Ajjhācāre vītikkame sati.
tika-s0103t:970_0: Yathānurūpanti “dvīhi samathehi catūhi tīhi ekenā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena yathānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0103t:975_7: Vināpi hi bhāvajotanaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti,
tika-s0103t:975_12: taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe “kāyika”ntipi vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “duvidhampī”ti.
tika-s0103t:976_2: Imināva nayenāti iminā kusītavatthūsu vutteneva nayena.
tika-s0103t:976_4: “idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmīti evaṃ bhāvanāya abbhussahanaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārambhavatthū”tiādinā ca attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:976_5: Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ abbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:976_7: tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni veditabbāni.
tika-s0103t:977_5: Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhukāmatā rāgādayo viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ,
tika-s0103t:977_7: Na idaṃ tādisaṃ corabhayādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:977_8: Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā dīyati,
tika-s0103t:977_12: Sāhu dānanti “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññatta”nti sādhusamācāre ṭhatvā deti.
tika-s0103t:977_15: Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0103t:977_18: paccanīkadhammavidūrībhāvakaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkāratthaṃ,
tika-s0103t:977_21: Muducitto hoti laddhā dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti,
tika-s0103t:978_0: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti vase vattanti.
tika-s0103t:978_1: Adānaṃ dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pana pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
tika-s0103t:979_0: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya, suparisuddhatāya, guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca.
tika-s0103t:980_5: Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā uparūpari tenevākārena pavattati,
tika-s0103t:980_13: Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato upari maggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
tika-s0103t:980_17: na dānamayassa puññassa kevalassa taṃsaṃvattanatādassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:981_6: Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kiṃ atthiyanti āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:981_7: Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte verīpuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
tika-s0103t:982_0: Parisīdati parito ito cito ca samāgacchatīti parisā, samūho.
tika-s0103t:983_2: Yasmā te lokadhammā aparāparaṃ kadāci lokaṃ anupatanti,
tika-s0103t:983_4: tasmā tañcettha atthaṃ dassento “aṭṭhime”ti suttapadaṃ āhari.
tika-s0103t:983_10: Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodhe sati virodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti,
tika-s0103t:983_11: tasmā vuttaṃ “lābhe āgate alābho āgato evā”ti.
tika-s0103t:986_1: Vasati tattha phalaṃ tannimittakatāya pavattatīti vatthu,
tika-s0103t:986_7: Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati,
tika-s0103t:986_10: Taṃ panassa paccayavasena nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “karoti uppādetī”ti.
tika-s0103t:987_0: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:987_1: padajjhāhārena ca attho veditabboti dassento “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:987_6: tasmā kevalaṃ tasmiṃ mayhaṃ kujjhanamattaṃ evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:987_7: Atha vā taṃ kopakaraṇamettha puggale kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa,
tika-s0103t:987_14: Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anuppattito.
tika-s0103t:988_3: Yasmā te te sattanikāyā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro viya vattabbataṃ
tika-s0103t:988_10: yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0103t:988_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha “asabbakālikattā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:988_12: Vehapphalo pana catutthaṃyeva sattāvāsaṃ bhajatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:989_2: taṃ pana vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kilesesu upasantesu upasamati,
tika-s0103t:990_0: Yasmiṃ devanikāye dhammadesanā na viyujjati savanasseva abhāvato,
tika-s0103t:990_1: so pāḷiyaṃ “dīghāyuko devanikāyo”ti adhippetoti āha “asaññabhavaṃ vā arūpabhavaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0103t:992_0: 344. Anupubbanirodhāti anupubbena anukkamena pavattetabbanirodhā. Tenāha “anupaṭipāṭiyā nirodhā”ti.
tika-s0103t:995_1: Yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati īsati abhibhavatīti nāthoti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:995_2: te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā “nāthakaraṇā”ti vuttāti āha “sanāthā…pe…
tika-s0103t:996_2: so vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti tassa atthitāmattaṃ kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:996_3: Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti vuttanti āha “tevassā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:996_4: Tevassāti te eva kalyāṇamittā assa bhikkhuno.
tika-s0103t:996_7: samodhāne pana cittena ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko.
tika-s0103t:997_0: Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti suvaco.
tika-s0103t:997_7: Padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhātīti sammā yoniso vā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:998_2: khuddake ca kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā,
tika-s0103t:998_3: tassa tassa kammassa nipphādanena samatthāyāti attho.
tika-s0103t:998_4: Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0103t:999_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānaṃpi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:999_3: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:999_8: tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:999_9: Abhidhammo sattappakaraṇāni adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammoti katvā.
tika-s0103t:999_15: Kilesavūpasamakāraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito samatho vipassanā ca.
tika-s0103t:1000_3: Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0103t:1001_3: asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti attho.
tika-s0103t:1001_4: Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1001_10: “Paricchinditvā” ti idaṃ uddhaṃ adhoti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1001_11: Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1001_12: Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena.
tika-s0103t:1001_14: Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo,
tika-s0103t:1001_17: samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti;
tika-s0103t:1002_3: na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-s0103t:1002_6: Na hi udake ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
tika-s0103t:1002_9: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1002_13: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti,
tika-s0103t:1003_6: evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0103t:1003_7: tattakaṃ sakalameva pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā
tika-s0103t:1003_8: vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭiṃ ākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0103t:1005_6: Gārayhatā cassa ekantanihīnatāya evāti āha “ekantanindito lāmakācāro”ti.
tika-s0103t:1006_17: Sevanacitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanapayogassa abhāvato.
tika-s0103t:1006_18: Tasmiṃ asati puretaraṃ sevanacittassa upaṭṭhāpanepi tassā micchācāro na siyā,
tika-s0103t:1006_20: Tasmā attano ruciyā pavattitassa vasena tayo balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena “cattāro sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1007_0: Upasaggavasena atthavisesavācino dhātusaddāti “abhijjhāyatī”ti padassa “parabhaṇḍābhimukhī”tiādinā attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:1007_1: Tattha tanninnatāyāti tasmiṃ parabhaṇḍe lubbhanavasena ninnatāyāti ayamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:1007_5: Adinnādānassa appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāti āha “adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā,
tika-s0103t:1008_2: tassa tassa sati samavāye hitasukhaṃ vināseti.
tika-s0103t:1008_3: Pharusavācāya appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vibhāvitāti āha “pharusavācā viyā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:1008_7: “Aho vatā”ti iminā parassa accantāya vināsacintanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0103t:1009_0: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvenāti yāthāvagahaṇassa abhāvena aniccādisabhāvassa niccādito gahaṇena.
tika-s0103t:1010_1: Koṭṭhāsatoti phassapañcamakādīsu cittaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu ye koṭṭhāsā honti,
tika-s0103t:1012_0: “Paṭipāṭiyā sattā”ti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na,
tika-s0103t:1012_2: Na hi tattha cetanāya akammapathappattattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:1013_1: yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:1013_2: nanu abhijjhādīnampi kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya aniyato kammapathabhāvoti tesampi kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-s0103t:1013_3: Nāpajjati kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatā hi tesaṃ tattha vuttattā.
tika-s0103t:1013_4: Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā siyāti?
tika-s0103t:1013_6: sā pana pāṇātipātādikāvāti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvoti na vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0103t:1013_11: kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ kāyakamma”nti vacanato kammabhāvo pākaṭo;
tika-s0103t:1013_13: taduppajjanasukhadukkhānañca pathabhāvena pavattaṃ “kammapatho”ti vuccatīti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvo.
tika-s0103t:1013_16: cāti na tathā pākaṭo kammapathabhāvoti te eva tena sabhāvena dassetuṃ abhidhamme cetanā kammapathabhāve na vuttā,
tika-s0103t:1013_17: atathājātiyattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1014_0: “Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇa”nti idaṃ “pañcasikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā evā”ti imāya pañhapucchakapāḷiyā virujjhati.
tika-s0103t:1014_5: tameva upādāya vuttanti na koci virodho.
tika-s0103t:1014_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “yāni sikkhāpadāni ettha ‘sattārammaṇānī’ti vuttāni,
tika-s0103t:1014_7: tāni yasmā sattoti saṅkhaṃ gate saṅkhāreyeva ārammaṇaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1014_15: “Natthi sattā opapātikā”ti pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavisayā evāti adhippāyenassā saṅkhārārammaṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0103t:1014_16: Kathaṃ pana micchādiṭṭhiyā sabbe tebhūmakadhammā ārammaṇaṃ hotīti?
tika-s0103t:1014_18: “Natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti pavattamānāya atthato rūpārūpāvacaradhammāpi gahitā eva hontīti.
tika-s0103t:1015_1: hāso pana nesaṃ attavūpasamādiaññavisayoti āha “sanniṭṭhāpaka…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1015_4: Musāvādo lobhasamuṭṭhāno sukhavedano vā siyā majjhattavedano vā,
tika-s0103t:1015_6: Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ vedanābhedo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:1018_2: Verahetutāya verasaññitaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ maṇati “mayi idha ṭhitāya kathaṃ āgacchasī”ti tajjantī viya nīharatīti veramaṇī,
tika-s0103t:1018_3: viramati etāyāti vā “viramaṇī”ti vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1018_6: Kilesānaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattā maggasampayuttā virati samucchedavirati.
tika-s0103t:1018_8: sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana cetanāpi āharitvā dassitāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “cetanāpi vattanti viratiyopī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:1018_9: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvāti kammapathakoṭṭhāse “anabhijjhā”ti vuttadhammo mūlato alobho kusalamūlaṃ hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:1019_0: Dussīlyārammaṇā tadārammaṇajīvitindriyādiārammaṇā kathaṃ dussīlyāni pajahantīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1019_4: Na hi tadeva ārabbha taṃ pajahituṃ sakkā tato avinissaṭabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:1020_2: Na hi manoduccaritato virati atthi anabhijjhādīheva tappahānasiddhito.
tika-s0103t:1022_1: Ariyānameva vāsāti ariyavāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0103t:1022_3: te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avirahitavāsā eva,
tika-s0103t:1022_4: tasmā vuttaṃ “ariyā eva vasiṃsu vasanti vasissantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1025_3: Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni.
tika-s0103t:1025_4: Diṭṭhigatānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya “saccānī”ti voharīyanti.
tika-s0103t:1026_0: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekalyanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti,
tika-s0103t:1028_0: Paccavekkhaṇāya phalaṃ kathitanti paccavekkhaṇamukhena ariyaphalaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1028_1: Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0103t:1030_2: Phalasampayuttadhammāti phaladhammā ceva taṃsampayuttadhammā cāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:1030_3: Dvīsupi ṭhānesu paññāva kathitā sammā dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0103t:1030_9: Ariyaphalasampayuttadhammāpi hi sabbaso paṭipakkhato vimuttataṃ upādāya “vimuttī”ti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-s0103t:1030_10: Kenaci pana yathā asekkhā phalapaññā dassanakiccaṃ upādāya “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0103t:1030_14: Evañca katvā “anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”nti dutiyavimuttiggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0103t:1034_2: Āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ avivādahetubhūtaṃ tattha tattha bhagavatā desitānaṃ atthānaṃ saṅgāyanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-s0103t:1034_3: tassa ca kāraṇaṃ ayaṃ suttadesanā tathā pavattattāti vuttaṃ “saṅgītipariyāyanti sāmaggiyā kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0103t:1034_5: bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathā”ti ussāhetvā ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā suṇanto,
tika-s0103t:1034_7: sādhū”ti anumodanena pākaṭā jātāti vuttaṃ “anumodanena samanuñño ahosī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1034_10: Yathā hi rājayuttehi likhitapaṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañjitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:1034_14: sādhu sāriputtā”tiādi anumodanavacanasaṃsūcitāya samanuññāsaṅkhātāya jinavacanamuddāya lañjitattā ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto āhaccavacano.
tika-s0103t:1037_1: Āvuso bhikkhaveti sāvakānaṃ ālapananti sāvakānaṃ āmantanavasena ālapanasamudācāro,
tika-s0103t:1037_5: Satthusamudācāravasena asamudācāro evettha satthu uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1037_6: Sampati āgatattā katthaci na nibaddho vāso etesanti anibaddhavāsā,
tika-s0103t:1037_8: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sappāyasenāsanaṃ gavesantā yaṃ kiñci disaṃ gacchantīti disāgamanīyā.
tika-s0103t:1038_1: Tatthāpi puggalavemattataṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ tadanurūpameva deti.
tika-s0103t:1038_3: kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya pana bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ sammohavigamāya paṭhamaṃ uddesaparipucchādhammassavanadhammasākacchāsu
tika-s0103t:1038_6: Saddhācaritassa visesato purimā cha anussatiyo sappāyā,
tika-s0103t:1038_7: tāsaṃ pana anuyuñjane ayaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattīti dassetuṃ “pasādanīyasuttante”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1038_16: Temāsikaṃ paṭipadanti tīhi māsehi sanniṭṭhāpetabbaṃ paṭipadaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1039_0: Ime bhikkhūti imissā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūtā bhikkhū.
tika-s0103t:1039_1: “Evaṃ āgantvā gacchante pana bhikkhū”ti idaṃ “buddhakāle”tiādinā taduddesikavasena vuttabhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:1039_7: Āyasmā hi dhammasenāpati bhikkhū yebhuyyena sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā vissajjeti “evamete niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti.
tika-s0103t:1039_8: Āyasmā pana mahāmoggallāno “sabbāpi bhavūpapatti jigucchitabbāvā”ti bhikkhū yebhuyyena uttamatthaṃyeva pāpeti.
tika-s0103t:1040_0: Sāvakehi vinetuṃ sakkuṇeyyā sāvakaveneyyā nāma na sāvakeheva vinetabbāti dassento āha “sāvakaveneyyā nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:1040_1: Dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā dasadhā dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vibhattoti dasuttaro.
tika-s0103t:1040_2: Dasuttaro gatotipi dasuttaroti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā dasahi uttaro adhiko hutvā gato pavattotipi dasuttaro.
tika-s0103t:1040_3: Ekekasmiṃ pabbeti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā dasasu pabbesu ekekasmiṃ pabbe.
tika-s0103t:1040_4: Dasa dasa pañhāti “katamo dhammo bahukāro appamādo kusalesu dhammesū”tiādinā dasa dasa pañhā.
tika-s0103t:1040_6: Dasuttaraṃ pavakkhāmīti desiyamānaṃ desanaṃ nāmakittanamukhena paṭijānāti vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1040_8: Tathā hettha paññāsādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pañhasatānaṃ vasena desanā pavattā.
tika-s0103t:1040_10: saddo pariyattipariyāyo “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0103t:1040_14: sa cāyamassa ānubhāvo sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ pamocanupāyabhāvatoti dassento “nibbānappattiyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:1041_0: Uccaṃ karontoti udaggaṃ uḷāraṃ paṇītaṃ katvā dassento,
tika-s0103t:1041_3: Idañca desanāya paggaṇhanaṃ buddhānampi āciṇṇaṃ evāti dassento “ekāyano”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:1044_0: (Kha) vaḍḍhane vutte nānantariyatāya uppādanaṃ vuttameva hotīti “bhāvetabboti vaḍḍhetabbo”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:1044_2: Nanu ca “eko dhammo uppādetabbo”ti uppādanaṃ pettha visuṃ gahitaṃ evāti?
tika-s0103t:1044_4: Tathā hi “eko dhammo pariññeyyo”ti tīhipi pariññāhi pariññeyyataṃ vatvāpi “eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti pahātabbatā vuttā.
tika-s0103t:1051_0: Sabbattha mātikāsūti dukādivasena vuttāsu sabbāsu mātikāsu.
tika-s0103t:1051_1: Ettha ca āyasmā dhammasenāpati te bhikkhū bhāvanāya niyojetvā uttamatthe patiṭṭhāpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva
tika-s0103t:1051_2: bhāvanāya upakāradhammaṃ uddesavasena dassento “eko dhammo bahukāro”ti vatvā tena upakārakena upakattabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:1051_4: Ayañca bhāvanā vipassanāvasena icchitāti āha “eko dhammo pariññeyyo”ti.
tika-s0103t:1051_5: Pariññā ca nāma yāvadeva pahātabbapajahanatthāti āha “eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti.
tika-s0103t:1051_6: Pajahantena ca hānabhāgiyaṃ nīharitvā visesabhāgiye avaṭṭhātabbanti āha “eko dhammo hānabhāgiyo,
tika-s0103t:1051_10: nipphādetabbanipphādanaṃ siddhameva hotīti āha “eko dhammo duppaṭivijjho,
tika-s0103t:1051_12: Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ abhiññeyyādijānanena hotīti āha “eko dhammo abhiññeyyo”ti.
tika-s0103t:1051_16: nāssa uttari kiñci karaṇīyanti evaṃ tāva mahāthero ekakavasena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ uddisanto imāni dasa padāni iminā anukkamena uddisi.
tika-s0103t:1052_0: (Ka) evaṃ aniyamato uddiṭṭhadhamme sarūpato niyametvā dassetuṃ “katamo eko dhammo”tiādinā desanaṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0103t:1052_4: So hi veḷuvikārehi kilañjādikaraṇena “veḷukāro”ti vutto. Anto,
tika-s0103t:1052_5: bahi ca sabbagatagaṇṭhiṃ nīharaṇena niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:1052_6: Ekekakoṭṭhāseti ekakādīsu dasasu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0103t:1053_0: Sabbatthakaṃ upakārakanti sabbatthakameva sammā paṭipattiyā upakāravantaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1053_2: Vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpaneti yathā upari vipassanā paripaccati tikkhā visadā hutvā maggena ghaṭeti,
tika-s0103t:1053_12: Aṭṭhasu vijjāsūti ambaṭṭhasutte āgatanayāsu aṭṭhasu vijjāsu.
tika-s0103t:1054_0: Teneva bhagavā thometīti yojanā. Nanti appamādaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1055_1: Dīpetvāti “evampi appamādo kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sampādane bahupakāro”ti pakāsetvā.
tika-s0103t:1055_2: Yaṃ kiñci anavajjapakkhikamatthaṃ appamāde pakkhipitvā kathetuṃ yuttanti dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1056_5: Ettha uppannasatiyāti etasmiṃ yathāvutte ekūnatiṃsavidhe ṭhāne uppannāya satiyā.
tika-s0103t:1056_7: pariyāyato pana catutthajjhāne upekkhāpi “sukha”nti vattabbataṃ labhati santasabhāvattā.
tika-s0103t:1057_0: (Ga) paccayabhūto ārammaṇādivisayopi ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave paggharati,
tika-s0103t:1060_0: (Cha) idha pana vipassanānantaro maggo “ānantariko cetosamādhī”ti adhippeto. Kasmā?
tika-s0103t:1062_2: Ayaṃ eko dhammoti ayaṃ paccayasaṅkhāto eko dhammoti paccayatāsamaññena ekaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-s0103t:1063_1: Aññathā sabbāpi phalasamāpattiyo akuppā eva paṭipakkhehi akopanīyattā.
tika-s0103t:1064_3: Pahānapariññāva kathitā pahānasacchikiriyānaṃ ekāvāratāya pariññāya saheva ijjhanato.
tika-s0103t:1064_6: Phalaṃ pana anekesupi padesu labbhati paṭhamaṭṭhamanavamadasamesu labbhanato.
tika-s0103t:1064_7: Yasmā taṃ nippariyāyato dasame eva labbhati,
tika-s0103t:1064_8: itaresu pariyāyato tasmā “labbhati evā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0103t:1065_4: Na tathā na hontīti avitathattā tathāva honti.
tika-s0103t:1065_5: Tato eva vuttappakārato aññathā na hontīti pañcahipi padehi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtameva vadati.
tika-s0103t:1065_8: taṃ hetuyuttaṃ kāraṇayuttameva hotīti āha “hetunā kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:1068_2: “Sīlapūraṇādīsu sabbattha appamādo viya upakārakā”ti etena satisampajaññānampi appamādassa viya sabbattha
tika-s0103t:1068_3: upakārakatā pakāsitā hoti atthato nātivilakkhaṇattā tato tesaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1068_5: so ca atthato sabbattha avijahitā sati eva,
tika-s0103t:1068_6: sā ca kho ñāṇasampayuttā eva daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0103t:1069_0: (Kha) tesaṃ pañcasatamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattivasena desitattā pubbabhāgā kathitā.
tika-s0103t:1070_5: yonisomanasikāroti “ime dve dhammā duppaṭivijjhā”ti ettha nīharitvā vuttā,
tika-s0103t:1070_6: evaṃ imehi dhammā nīharitvā vattabbāti dassento “tathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:1070_7: Tattha asubhajjhānādayo cattāro visaṃyogā nāma kāmayogādipaṭipakkhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:1071_0: (Jha) paccayehi samecca sambhuyya katattā pañcakkhandhā saṅkhatā dhātu.
tika-s0103t:1073_2: Maggo kathitoti ettha “maggova kathito”ti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā “maggo kathitovā”ti evamattho gahetabbo “anuppāde ñāṇa”nti iminā phalassa gahitattā.
tika-s0103t:1073_3: Sacchikātabbapade phalaṃ kathitanti etthāpi “phalameva kathita”nti aggahetvā “phalaṃ kathitamevā”ti attho
tika-s0103t:1073_5: Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0103t:1076_3: Āruppe arahattamaggo nāma arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppanno aggamaggo.
tika-s0103t:1076_4: Puna uppattinivāraṇatoti rūpānaṃ uppattiyā sabbaso nivāraṇato.
tika-s0103t:1076_7: Tena hi kilesavaṭṭe nirodhite itarampi vaṭṭadvayaṃ nirodhitameva hoti.
tika-s0103t:1076_8: Tassa pana nirodhassa pariyosānattā aggaphalaṃ “nirodho”ti vattabbataṃ labbhatīti āha “arahattaphalaṃ nirodhoti adhippeta”nti.
tika-s0103t:1076_9: “Arahattaphalena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe” ti idaṃ arahattamaggena nibbānadassanassāyaṃ nibbattīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1076_10: Evañca katvā “arahattasaṅkhātanirodhassa paccayattā” ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:1078_0: (Ña) āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti ca āsavānaṃ khayante ñāṇanti adhippāyo, aññathā maggo kathito siyā.
tika-s0103t:1082_4: Attano sammā ṭhapananti attano cittasantānassa yoniso ṭhapanaṃ saddhādīsu nivesananti āha “sace”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:1082_5: Idamevettha pamāṇanti idameva pubbekatapuññatāsaṅkhātaṃ sampatticakkamettha etesu sampatticakkesu pamāṇabhūtaṃ itaresaṃ kāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:1082_7: So eva ca katapuñño puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti akatapuññassa tadabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:1082_11: Pubbabhāge lokiyāvāti maggassa pubbabhāge pavattanakā lokiyā eva.
tika-s0103t:1083_2: itare dve arahattamaggoti evaṃ anāgāmimaggādivasena veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:1084_0: (Cha) paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, taṃ.
tika-s0103t:1084_1: Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti tudenti.
tika-s0103t:1084_2: Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi hāyati parihāyati,
tika-s0103t:1084_6: Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā apekkhamānā abhinandamānā nikanti hoti,
tika-s0103t:1084_7: tassa nikantivasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi neva hāyati,
tika-s0103t:1085_0: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā.
tika-s0103t:1085_1: Samudācarantīti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudenti,
tika-s0103t:1085_2: tassa upari dutiyajjhānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi visesabhūtassa
tika-s0103t:1085_4: Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā.
tika-s0103t:1085_5: Vipassanāñāṇañhi jhānaṅgesu pabhedena upaṭṭhahantesu nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati,
tika-s0103t:1085_9: Vipassanāñāṇañhi “sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātu”nti pavattito “virāgūpasañhita”nti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:1085_11: Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānatāya “nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhī”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:1085_13: Attho veditabboti hānabhāgiyādiattho tāva vitthāretvā veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:1086_0: Maggo kathito catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ uddhaṭattā. Phalaṃ kathitaṃ sarūpeneva.
tika-s0103t:1089_1: (Kha) “pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhī”ti samādhiaṅgabhāvena paññā uddiṭṭhāti pītipharaṇatādivacanena hi tameva vibhajati.
tika-s0103t:1089_2: Tenāha “pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatī”tiādi.“So imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādinā nayena pītiyā,
tika-s0103t:1089_5: Ālokapharaṇeti kasiṇālokassa pharaṇe sati teneva ālokena pharitappadese.
tika-s0103t:1090_0: Pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatāti ārammaṇe ṭhatvā catutthajjhānassa uppādanato tā “pādā viyā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0103t:1090_1: Cetopharaṇatā ālokapharaṇatāti taṃtaṃkiccasādhanato tā “hatthā viyā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0103t:1091_0: (Ja) sabbaso kilesadukkhadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vigatattā lokiyasamādhissa sātisayamettha sukhanti vuttaṃ “appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho”ti.
tika-s0103t:1091_1: Purimassa purimassa vasena pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ laddhāsevanatāya santatarapaṇītatarabhāvappatti hotīti āha “purimo purimo…pe…
tika-s0103t:1092_5: imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:1092_6: vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogena adhigatattā,
tika-s0103t:1092_7: ṭhapitattā ca aparihānavasena vā ṭhapitattā nasaṅkhāraniggayhavārivāvaṭo.
tika-s0103t:1092_8: “Sativepullappattattā”ti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti,
tika-s0103t:1092_11: Pañcañāṇikoti ettha vuttasamādhimukhena pañca ñāṇāneva uddiṭṭhāni,
tika-s0103t:1096_0: 356. Maggo kathitoti ettha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0103t:1098_7: anāgate ca aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti atītānāgatesu nayananayena.
tika-s0103t:1098_8: Kāmaṃ khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādi sudiṭṭhā suppaṭividdhā,
tika-s0103t:1098_10: vipassanāya pana ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti dassento āha “vipassanāñāṇena sudiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1098_12: vatthukāmāvassayo cāti vuttaṃ “dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:1101_1: (Ka) ādibrahmacariyikāyāti ādibrahmacariyā eva ādibrahmacariyikā yathā “vinayo eva venayiko”ti,
tika-s0103t:1101_8: Uppattikāle pana natthi maggadhammānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānatā ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā ekajjhaṃyeva uppajjanato.
tika-s0103t:1101_10: taṃ pana vallabhavasena pavattamānaṃ gehasitasadisaṃ hotīti “gehasitapema”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1101_11: Garukaraṇavasena pavattiyā garu cittaṃ etassāti garucitto,
tika-s0103t:1101_14: “Kilesā na uppajjantī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “ovādānusāsaniṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1101_15: Garūnañhi santike ovādānusāsaniṃ labhitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantassa kilesā na uppajjanti.
tika-s0103t:1102_2: Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
tika-s0103t:1102_3: Āvāhanaṃ gacchantīti sambhogasaṃsaggamukhena peteheva asurānaṃ saṅgahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:1103_8: Santaguṇanigūhanenāti attani saṃvijjamānānaṃ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa ca dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca nigūhanena chādanena.
tika-s0103t:1103_11: icchaṃ vā mahantassa no sampajjati anudhammassāpi anicchanato.
tika-s0103t:1105_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā,
tika-s0103t:1105_1: sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa.
tika-s0103t:1105_4: tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṃ dhammo”ti vacanato.
tika-s0103t:1105_8: Kammassakatāpaññāya hi patiṭṭhato kammavasena “bhavesu nānappakāro anattho”ti jānanto kammakkhayakarañāṇaṃ abhipattheti,
tika-s0103t:1105_10: Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcāti āha “nippapañcassāti vigatamānataṇhādiṭṭhipapañcassā”ti.
tika-s0103t:1108_6: Samathassa visuddhibhāvo vodānaṃ paguṇabhāvena paricchinnanti āha “aṭṭha paguṇasamāpattiyo”ti.
tika-s0103t:1108_12: tasmā taṃ pariggaṇhantena atthato tassa sappaccayatāpi pariggahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhivisuddhīti sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpadassana”nti.
tika-s0103t:1108_13: Yasmā pana nāmarūpassa paccayaṃ pariggaṇhantena tīsu addhāsu kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇapaccayākārāvabodhavaseneva hoti,
tika-s0103t:1108_16: Ñāṇanti idha taruṇavipassanā kathitā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “ñāṇadassanavisuddhī”ti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya vuccamānattā.
tika-s0103t:1109_8: taṃ papañcetī”ti vacanato “saṅkappanānattaṃ paṭicca chandanānatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1109_12: Kileso hi uppajjamāno appattepi ārammaṇe patto viya pariḷāhova uppajjati.
tika-s0103t:1109_13: Tathābhūtassa pana kilesachandassa vasena rūpādipariyesanā hotīti āha “pariḷāhanānattatāya rūpapariyesanādinānattaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:1109_14: Tathā pariyesantassa sace taṃ rūpādi labbheyya,
tika-s0103t:1110_2: Āhāraṃ pariggaṇhantassāti gamanādivasena āhāraṃ paṭikkūlato pariggaṇhantassa.
tika-s0103t:1112_2: Imasmiṃ abhiññāpade maggo kathīyatīti katvā “ayaṃ heṭṭhā..pe…
tika-s0103t:1112_4: Tathā hi vakkhati “idha abhiññāpade maggo kathito” kiñcāpi nijjiṇṇā micchādiṭṭhīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:1112_5: Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā,
tika-s0103t:1112_6: evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho “micchāsaṅkappo”tiādīsu
tika-s0103t:1112_7: sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti “evaṃ sabbapadesu nayo netabbo”ti iminā.
tika-s0103t:1113_0: Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti etasmiṃ pāḷipade.
tika-s0103t:1113_2: paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammā sammadeva vimuccanaṃ sammāvimutti,
tika-s0103t:1113_3: tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni.
tika-s0103t:1113_4: Maggavasena hi phalesu bhāvanā pāripūrī nāmāti.
tika-s0103t:1113_6: Somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvaṃ sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya pavattati.
tika-s0103t:1114_0: Addhena saha chaṭṭhāni pañhasatāni, paññāsādhikāni saha pañhasatānīti attho.
tika-s0103t:1115_0: Ettha ca āyasmā dhammasenāpati “dasasu nāthakaraṇadhammesu patiṭṭhāya dasakasiṇāyatanāni bhāvento dasaāyatanamukhena
tika-s0103t:1115_2: dasaakusalakammapathe ca pahāya dasakusalakammapathesu ca avaṭṭhito dasasu ariyāvāsesu āvasitukāmo dasasaññā
tika-s0103t:1115_3: uppādento dasanijjaravatthūni abhiññāya dasaasekkhadhamme adhigacchatī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ matthakaṃ
tika-s0103t:1115_5: Pamodavasena paṭiggaṇhanaṃ abhinandananti āha “sādhu sādhūti abhinandantā sirasā sampaṭicchiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0103t:1115_8: Imameva suttaṃ āvajjamānāti imasmiṃ sutte tattha tattha āgate abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhijānanādivasena samannāharantā.
tika-s0103t:1115_11: therassa ca desanānubhāvena yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukketvā paṭisambhidāparivārāya abhiññāya saṇṭhahiṃsūti.
tika-s0103t:1121_0: Therānaṃ mahākassapādīnaṃ vaṃso paveṇī anvayo etassāti theravaṃsanvayo, tena;
tika-s0103t:1122_3: sampasādanīyādīsu ca tattha tattha visesato buddhaguṇānaṃ pakāsanavasena pavattoti.
tika-s0103t:1125_0: Mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaṃ dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāsārameva puna nigamanavasena vadati.
tika-s0103t:1125_2: tenetaṃ dasseti “dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sumaṅgalavilāsiniṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi
tika-s0103t:1125_3: mūlakaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāyayeva akāsi”nti.
tika-s0103t:1126_0: “Mahāvihāravāsīna”nti [mahāvihāre nivāsinaṃ (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:1126_4: Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbopi sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamanavasena sampattena
tika-s0103t:1126_5: nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantasukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0103t:1129_0: Rakkhaṇatthāya sakkaccaṃ, mañjūsaṃ viya kāritanti. (etthantare pāṭho pacchā likhito)
